data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bian, Dongju, Ji, Lanzhu (2012): Notes on Chinese Allopachria Zimmermann, with descriptions of two new species from Guangxi (Coleoptera: Dytiscidae). Zootaxa 3151: 28-34, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.213084
